txt.en: You have accompanied Saeradan and Amlan to confront the witch Gwyllion, called the Old Woman of the Mountain by the Dunlending locals, at her home atop Methedras, a great mountain overlooking the vale of Nan Curun√≠r and Isengard.
Complete 'Storm on Methedras' in a raid group
Gwyllion, the Old Woman of the Mountain, seeks to raise an army of fell spirits and wights to aid Isengard against Rohan.
